name: Natural Disaster
description: Earthquake, tornado, wildfire, or severe flooding strikes the kingdom.
location: a random worksite and 2 adjacent hexes (roll 1d6)
special: Can spend 1 Gold per hex before rolling to gain +2 to that check (emergency supplies). If one of the adjacent hexes has a settlement, treat it as a Local Disaster for that settlement.

modifierTemplate.name: Natural Disaster Aftermath
modifierTemplate.description: The natural disaster has left widespread devastation requiring ongoing recovery efforts

onResolution.successMsg: The natural disaster aftermath situation has been resolved!
onResolution.failureMsg: Failed to resolve the natural disaster aftermath situation

criticalSuccess.msg: Minimal damage; citizens impressed by response, -1 Unrest

success.msg: Some damage; lose 1 Resource from this hex

failure.msg: Major damage; lose all production from the hex this turn, +1 Unrest

criticalFailure.msg: Devastating losses. Any worksites are removed from the hex, +2 Unrest

modifiers.name: Devastating losses. Any worksites are removed from the hex
